name: Army Men
description: Every conquering army needs a great leader. Even the plastic ones! Take control as the sergeant in the field, leading your men into the heat of battle in this tactical action game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.4 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D Graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Multiplayer is not supported
